articles.content: Venture capitalist Bill Gurley on Tuesday cheered a change in the direct listing process approved by U.S. regulators, telling CNBC he believes it will "unquestionably" usher in the end of traditional… [+3506 chars]

articles.title: USPS responds after unprecedented holiday shipping delays - WXYZ
articles.description: On Monday, the 7 Investigators showed you how thousands of packages were bottle-necked at the Allen Park USPS distribution center.

articles.title: 'Bittersweet': Nurse who received Moderna vaccine describes experience - CNN
articles.description: Arlene Ramirez, a New York nurse who was among the first to receive the Moderna Covid-19 vaccine, calls her experience receiving the vaccine "very bitterswee...

articles.author: Dan Petrella
articles.title: Chicago makes plans for first mass vaccination sites as health care workers outside hospitals are slated for shots - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: Chicago plans to open its first mass vaccination sites next week to help inoculate more health care workers against the coronavirus, the city’s top health official said Tuesday.
